original_text: And then the coast turneth to Ramah, and to the strong city Tyre; and the coast turneth to Hosah; and the outgoings thereof are at the sea from the coast to Achzib:
korean_text: 돌아서 라마와 견고한 성읍 두로에 이르고 돌아서 호사에 이르고 악십 지방 곁 바다가 끝이 되며

sentences.original_text: And then the coast turneth to Ramah,
and to the strong city Tyre;
and the coast turneth to Hosah;
and the outgoings thereof are at the sea
